contributionDescription: Make more people using optimsm & get more adoption for optimsm chain on dex trade, staking, voted, claim badge & pass for verified personal account. Hopefully optimsm using on banking system, actualy in Indonesia & make more event on my country. Intregate on twitter, google pay, apple pay for payment & also expansion on gaming platform. I hope in 2024 optimsm can be faster & more cheapest gass fee transaction.

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating rule 1: "Promises of future impact." The applicant makes several promises about future achievements such as integrating with various payment platforms, expanding on gaming platforms, and making optimism faster with cheaper gas fees by 2024.
